Wenci
Kimba (Tsikimba; ma ọ bụ asụsụ Kambari II) bụ asụsụ Kainji nke Naijiria nke ndị Kambari na-asụ
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2004, e nwere 100,000 ndị na-asụ asụsụ ala.
E nwere asụsụ atọ: Kimba, Gaushi (Agaushi) na Wənci (Ngwunci)
Roger Blench na-ewere Gaushi na Wənci (Ngwunci) dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche.
Asụsụ Kimba nwere olumba atọ: Auna, Yumu na Wara.
A na-asụ asụsụ Ashɛ (Gaushi, Agaushi) na Garafini, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ọdọ Mmiri Kainji.
Asụsụ Ngwunci nwere olumba abụọ: Agwara (tsu-saweni) na Rofia (tsu-ɓwəshi).
